div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.strong: Belton ISD facilities are closed in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

span.p: Resources for students and parents to engage in extended learning opportunities, request support for special programs, access mental health resources and more at www.bisd.net/extendedlearning.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure

span.p: If you see something, say something any time using Belton ISD's anti-bullying and safety reporting system called Anonymous Alerts® to empower students, parents and community members to voice concerns to school officials. For more information visit bisd.net/safety.

a.title: Go to comments for Anonymous Alerts
Go to comments for Wifi Information
Go to comments for WiFi Certificate

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

a.span: Message from Belton ISD Board of Trustees

div.p: During this unprecedented time of school closure in response to the COVID-19 pandemic, Board Members have a message for the Big Red Community!

a.title: Go to comments for Message from Belton ISD Board of Trustees

a.span: Belton ISD continues extended learning through May 27, 2020

a.title: Go to comments for Belton ISD continues extended learning through May 27, 2020

div.p: Read more about the timeline for a decision on student instruction for the remainder of the school year, along with 2020-2021 enrollment and technology help desk support.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure Update 18

a.span: Now Open: New Student Enrollment & Returning Student Verification

a.title: Go to comments for Now Open: New Student Enrollment & Returning Student Verification
Go to comments for Kindergarten Enrollment Now Open

div.p: 2020-2021 Pre-K Enrollment is Now Open for Belton Early Childhood School

a.title: Go to comments for Pre-K Enrollment Underway

div.p: Discover more about New Student Enrollment, Returning Student Verification, Transfers, and Credit Union hours within this update.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure Update 17

a.span: Belton New Tech High @ Waskow Launches Virtual Parent Meetings

div.p: Learn about our enrollment process and view our 5-part video series to learn more!

a.title: Go to comments for Belton New Tech High @ Waskow Launches Virtual Parent Meetings

div.p: Information about Belton ISD's Mental Health resources, continued grab and go meals, and how to submit your questions is provided in this update.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure Update 16

a.span: Life Looks a Little Different These Days. Has Your Child Noticed?

div.p: School professionals offer advice for parents during school closure

a.title: Go to comments for Life Looks a Little Different These Days. Has Your Child Noticed?

div.p: Find information about the staff and student holiday on April 10, where to watch the message to seniors, and an update on upcoming enrollment and verification information.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure Update 15

a.span: Bode Approved as New Director of Student Services

div.p: With hiring, Stacie Seveska begins full-time role as principal at new Belton Middle School.

a.title: Go to comments for Bode Approved as New Director of Student Services

img.alt: Belton Senior Pens Emotional Song for Class of 2020

a.span: Belton Senior Pens Emotional Song for Class of 2020

div.p: Jaden Rudloff reminds classmates to 'look how far we've come' in original song.

a.title: Go to comments for Belton Senior Pens Emotional Song for Class of 2020

div.p: In this update you will find information about BEEF Scholarships, continued Grab-N-Go meals, and how to connect with today's Facebook Live video.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure Update 14

div.p: Information about Dr. Matt Smith's next Facebook Live, the Belton Federal Credit Union, and playground closures at Belton ISD can be found in this update.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure Update 13
